attributes.action: Make Domestic Violence a criminal law
attributes.additional_details: Domestic Violence should be against the law, it is increasing rapidly and has detrimental effects on the victims. If DV is made a criminal offence i believe we will see a significant decrease within DV. Disturbingly, not many people make it out alive, yet if they do they are so damaged mentally, that they are unable to proceed with a normal life.
attributes.background: Shockingly, DV is not against the law. Millions of people are damaged on a regular basis because of DV. DV impacts people Physically, psychologically, emotionally, mentally, financially and spiritually. Not enough is done to protect the victims and hold the perpetrators responsible.

rejection.details:
While it is true that there is no specific offence of 'domestic violence and domestic abuse', there are a number of offences for violence and abuse committed in a domestic environment.

You can read the Crown Prosecution Service's guidance on domestic abuse, which includes details of offences that would cover domestic violence and domestic abuse offences: https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/domestic-abuse

We could accept a petition calling for specific behaviours that are not already covered by a criminal offence to be made a criminal offence, or for minimum and maximum sentences for domestic abuse offences to be increased, if either of those are things you'd like to happen.
